summary: Completed comprehensive testing of refined MVP features. All backend APIs (31/31) working perfectly including new ORCID auth, trust score logic, and admin moderation. Frontend auth modal, ORCID validation, and analytics working correctly. Minor session expiration issue prevents full submission form testing but core functionality verified.

integration_issues.issue: User sessions expire quickly causing redirects to login

passed_tests: All 26 original backend API tests passing (100% success rate)
ORCID authentication endpoint creates users with trust_score=0 and hidden visibility
Publishers endpoint provides data for 'Other' option handling
Journals endpoint shows user-added vs verified status correctly
Admin moderation endpoint implements correct trust score calculation (+20 validated, +10 evidence, -15 flagged)
Analytics endpoints only include verified journals/publishers
Landing page 'Get Started' shows auth modal with Google and ORCID options
Auth modal displays privacy message about spam prevention
Login page has both Google and ORCID authentication options
ORCID authentication successfully creates user session
Analytics page loads and displays proper data visualization
Trust score starts at 0 for new users
Trust score visibility logic implemented (hidden until 2 validated or 1 with evidence)
Custom publisher/journal input fields present in submission form
